attributes.action: Call for a national unity government to steer the country after Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Given the serious ramifications of the referendum, and the fracture created in the country, we are concerned that infighting and polarised ideology is not what we need at this time. We need to bring the best parliamentarians and experts together who have the whole country's future at the forefront of what they do. And we leaders with vision who can bring this country together for the sake of all our children and grandchildren regardless how their parents and grandparents voted.
attributes.background: We the undersigned from both remain and leave camps believe the best way forward in the immediate term, is a form of unity government mandated to create the best conditions possible for all members of the British community and progressive relationships with the rest of the world.
